articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Welcome to ggGallery! Here is something you would like to know about this blog.
articles.contents:
Who
I am Gen-Chang Hsu, a young budding scientist with a broad interest
in ecology and evolutionary biology as well as data science, especially
data visualization. Check out my website for more information!
What
This blog is a place for everything related to ggplots and ggplot
extensions: proper usage of geoms and scales, handy tips for customizing
themes and legends, nice features of extension packages, and so on so
forth. In each post, I’ll explore a graphic topic/issue in depth and
provide some worked examples to show you how to make the most out of
ggplots.
Why
For fun and enjoyment, for learning and practice, for brainstorming
and communication, for achievement and satisfaction, for…


Go wild and be creative!

articles.title: Contact
articles.contents:
Any cool ideas or suggestions? I would love to hear from you! Contact
me by email or find me on GitHub, Twitter, and Facebook. Also visit my
website here!
